channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Spiro raises $100M, the largest-ever investment in Africa’s e-mobility
item.description: Dubai-headquartered Spiro is growing quickly with e-motorbikes and a battery swapping network designed for Africa's needs.

item.title: Easter Island's Moai Statues May Have Walked to Where They Now Stand
item.description: An archaeological mystery gets one step closer to being solved.

item.title: Bread Delivery Service Wildgrain Is $40 Off Right Now
item.description: This will be the biggest sale this year on Wildgrain’s oddly delicious bake-at-home sourdough, croissants, and pumpkin biscuits.

item.title: Yelp’s AI assistant can now scan restaurant menus to show you what dishes look like
item.description: Yelp will now let you scan a physical menu show redirect bubbles to Yelp app where you can see how those dishes look.

item.title: Luminkey Magger68 Plus HE Review: Mechanical Heart
item.description: Luminkey’s Hall effect Magger68 Plus has the heart of a mechanical keyboard.

item.title: YC alum Cercli, an AI-powered Rippling for MENA, raises oversubscribed $12M Series A

item.title: 17 Best Couches We’ve Tested That You Can Buy Online (2025)

item.title: European AI rising star Nexos.ai raises €30M to unlock enterprise AI adoption

item.title: Apple will let users roll back the Liquid Glass look with new ‘tinted’ option
item.description: Apple is responding to user feedback on its new Liquid Glass design with a setting that lets users choose between Clear and Tinted appearances. Introd...

item.title: Mystery Object From ‘Space’ Strikes United Airlines Flight Over Utah
item.description: Government investigators are gathering data to confirm what exactly cracked the windshield of a 737 Max aircraft at above 30,000 feet.
